full_summary:
### ITM for Emergency Generators & Transfer Switches, Kingston, Ontario

#### General Information:
* Title: Inspection, Testing, and Maintenance Services for Emergency Generators & Transfer Switches
* Reference Number: MX-22682853347
* Solicitation Number: KN229902_77400SC
* Original Posting Date: February 15, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: March 14, 2023 14:00:00 PST
* Expected Contract Start Date: June 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2026

#### Scope of Work:
The services required include, but are not limited to, the inspection, testing, maintenance, and minor repair of the Department's Emergency Generator Systems and associated Transfer Switch gear located at Canadian Forces Base Kingston. The contract will support 31 buildings at various locations on Base.

#### Security Requirements:
The successful contractor must hold a valid Facility Security Clearance at the level of SECRET, issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD) within Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC). The details of the Security Requirements are outlined in the Tender Documents.

#### Procurement Information:
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (GPA)
* Solicitation Status: expired

#### Additional Information:
* The estimated cost for this opportunity is in the range of $2,800,000.00.
* The Work must be completed no later than March 31, 2026.
* The preliminary tender results for this project will be available on MERX.
* Bidders can obtain contract award results from the Defence Construction Canada website at Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada.
